script:
# script "lisp"
# background "ancient_back"
# bgm "bgm036" 0
;;テュルソス
# body 600321
# pos 600321 3
# scale 600321 0.8 0
# alpha 600321 0 0
# mask 600321 off
;;覚醒テュルソス
# body 600325
# pos 600325 3
# scale 600325 0.8 0
# alpha 600325 0 0
# mask 600325 off
;;グングニル
# body 300841
# pos 300841 3
# scale 300841 0.8 0
# alpha 300841 0 0
# mask 300841 off
;;覚醒グングニル
# body 300844
# pos 300844 3
# scale 300844 0.8 0
# alpha 300844 0 0
# mask 300844 off
# imageset 1 "bg_white_circle"
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# imagelayer 1 4
# imagescale 1 1.2 0
# imageset 2 "bg_white_circle"
# imagealpha 2 0 0
# imagelayer 2 5
# imagescale 2 1.4 0
# imageset 3 "bg_white"
# imagealpha 3 0 0
# imagelayer 3 6
# imagescale 3 1.2 0
# se "SE_0545"
# textwindow "nomal"
# textalign "center"
# textsize 34
# textflame 0 0
@
[FF0000]新たな覚醒ユニット
2体登場！[-]

# textwindow "close"
# imagealpha 3 1 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 1

# alpha 600321 0.8 2
# imagealpha 1 1 0
# imagepos 1 0 0
# imagealpha 2 1 0
# imagepos 2 0 0
# imagealpha 3 0 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 0.5

# voice 6003 "tyurusosu_kyara_0019"
# waitandnext 3

# imagealpha 3 1 0.5
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 1

# se "SE_0548"
# alpha 600321 0 0
# alpha 600325 1 0
# envbody 1001 11 0
# effectpattern 1001 2 0
# effectstart 1001
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# imagealpha 2 0 0
# imagealpha 3 0 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 0.5

# textwindow "nomal"
# textalign "center"
# textsize 30
# voice 6003 "tyurusosu_kyara_0020"
# textflame 1 1
@
『テュルソス』[FF0000]覚醒！[-]
まだまだ先を目指すよ。
目標はもっと高いの！

# se "SE_0539"
# textwindow "close"
# fadeout "black" 0.5
# waitandnext 1

# effectskip 1001
# imageset 1 "bg_white_circle"
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# imagelayer 1 4
# imagescale 1 1.2 0
# imageset 2 "bg_white_circle"
# imagealpha 2 0 0
# imagelayer 2 5
# imagescale 2 1.4 0
# imageset 3 "bg_white"
# imagealpha 3 0 0
# imagelayer 3 6
# imagescale 3 1.2 0
# alpha 600325 0 0
# fadein "black" 0.5
# waitandnext 0.5

# imagealpha 3 1 0.5
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 0.5

# alpha 300841 0.8 2
# imagealpha 1 1 0
# imagepos 1 0 0
# imagealpha 2 1 0
# imagepos 2 0 0
# imagealpha 3 0 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 0.5

# voice 3008 "gunguniru_unit_0009"
# waitandnext 3

# imagealpha 3 1 0.5
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 1

# se "SE_0548"
# alpha 300841 0 0
# alpha 300844 1 0
# envbody 1002 11 0
# effectpattern 1002 2 0
# effectstart 1002
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# imagealpha 2 0 0
# imagealpha 3 0 1
# imagepos 3 0 0
# waitandnext 0.5

# textwindow "nomal"
# textalign "center"
# textsize 30
# voice 3008 "gunguniru_kyara_0019"
# textflame 1 1
@
『グングニル』[FF0000]覚醒！[-]
我が軍には勝利の二文字しか
存在しない。それだけだ

# textwindow "close"
# fadeout "black" 0.5
# waitandnext 0.5

# effectskip 1002
# alpha 300844 0 0
# waitandnext 0.5

# fadein "white" 0.5
# waitandnext 0.5

# move 600325 4 0
# move 300844 2 0
# mask 600325 on
# mask 300844 on
# alpha 600325 1 0
# alpha 300844 1 0
# textwindow "nomal"
# textalign "center"
# textsize 32
# textflame 0 0
@
イベントクエスト
「淘汰の彼方に」開催！

# fadeout "black" 1.5
# waitandnext 1.5
# textalign "center"
@
イベントクエスト
「淘汰の彼方に」開催！
